message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40.  It's a good offer, especially considering the money loses value over time.
I think a more even split is fair.  Let's each take a little less to ensure we both get a good amount.
Bob, time is running out and the money is literally disappearing!  My last offer was generous.  I'll take $55, you take $45. Let's close this deal.
Let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money. We both get a decent amount, and we don't risk losing everything.
